Graph the line that represents a proportional relationship between $d$  and $t$ with the property that an increase of $3$ units in $t$ corresponds to an increase of $8$ units in $d$. 


**What is the unit rate of change of $d$ with respect to $t$? **  (That is, a change of $1$ unit in $t$ will correspond to a change of how many units in $d$?) 

The unit rate of change is [[☃ input-number 1]] .
